Package org.jglfont.impl.format

Class JGLAbstractFontData

java.lang.Object
org.jglfont.impl.format.JGLAbstractFontData
Direct Known Subclasses:
JGLAwtFontData, JGLBitmapFontData
public abstract class JGLAbstractFontData extends Object
A Bitmap Font.

    • bitmaps

      protected Map<Integer,String> bitmaps
      All of the bitmaps this font requires (filenames). These are images that are bitmapWidth * bitmapHeight in size each.
